Title: Mulan
Writer: Rick Jaffa (screenplay by), Amanda Silver (screenplay by), Lauren Hynek (screenplay by), Elizabeth Martin (screenplay by), Anonymous (suggested by: the narrative poem "The Ballad of Mulan")
Actors: Yifei Liu, Donnie Yen, Li Gong, Jet Li
Plot: A young Chinese maiden disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 38 nominations.
